definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical features of central scotoma in glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討發生於青光眼的中央暗點所具備的臨牀特徵。

sentences.english: Symptoms that persist after operations for angle closure glaucoma arise from different causes.
sentences.chinese: 閉角青光眼術後持續症狀可由不同原因引起。

sentences.english: Glaucomatous optic nerve atrophy results from the abnormal intraocular pressure.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼性視神經萎縮由異常的眼內壓所致。

sentences.english: The vet may also use an ocular pressure meter for the detection of glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 職業教育和培訓也可用於檢測an青光眼的眼壓計。

sentences.english: It can fetch relief in both conjunctivitis and glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 它可以取救濟兩種結膜炎和青光眼。

sentences.english: Chronic Open-angle glaucoma is a common form of glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 開角型青光眼是常見的一種青光眼病症。

sentences.english: Chronic Open-angle glaucoma is a common form of glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 開角型青光眼是常見的一種青光眼病症。

sentences.english: Glaucoma is a potentially blinding illness that damages the optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼是一種破壞視神經的潛在性致盲疾病。

sentences.english: To investigate the long term effects of trabeculectomy on FHU with secondary glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 評價小梁切除術治療FHU繼發性青光眼的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Glaucoma is a group of diseases that cause damage to the optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼是一組導致視神經損傷的疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic effect of methazolamide on glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討醋甲唑胺對青光眼的治療價值。

sentences.english: The workers look for conditions including glaucoma , night blindness and other problems.
sentences.chinese: 醫療工作者查看情況包括青光眼，夜盲症和其它問題。

sentences.english: Prof. Tham's expertise in the laser and surgical management of glaucoma is internationally recognized.
sentences.chinese: 譚教授在治療青光眼的學術研究成就得到國際認可。

sentences.english: Sustained release drug membranes are prepared and applied to glaucoma therapy on operation.
sentences.chinese: 研製手術治療青光眼用複合藥膜。

sentences.english: Defects along inner margins of the iris may be from surgical correction for glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼手術矯正會引起虹膜內緣缺陷。

sentences.english: He has also used the device to investigate the pressure buildup that causes glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 他還利用該裝置調查了引起青光眼的壓力增強。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
to lose one's eyesight/to become blind/blindness
